comment: Dr. Goldfine is a very experienced professor - he's lived an interesting life and seen a lot of cool places. He goes on tangents but they're cool stories often and he just gives one group project. A lot of class collaboration/dsiscussions, I would take him again he knows how to coach very well!

Amazing professor who makes the class extremely clear. If you put in the time to turn assignments in on time, he will reward you. Nothing about this class is too challenging as he wants you to succeed and be a successful coach. The assignments can be kept and used for your future coaching affairs. He also helped me out in a big time jam. Great man!
Easy A for Well1000. Assignments are easy and approx 50% are completion grades. Would take again.

I was in his cycling class thinking it would be in a gym. When I found out we were going to ride actual bikes it kind of freaked me out, but I stuck with it and I'm glad I did. Would highly recommend an HPE class with him. Exam is heavily based on the textbook, videos on off days, and powerpoints, but an easy A if you show up and try.

Great guy, really. However, his teaching skills are not the best. His lectures go off track a lot and trust me, his exams are no joke. He does not teach much of what is on the exam. All I can say is read your textbook and STUDY the textbook. Also pay attention to the videos he plays in class. His exams are unexpectedly hard.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: The focus of this class is to encourage you to make healthy living adaptions. There is clear grading criteria, and he leaves positive feedback to help you improve. If you're taking a heavy course load, this is good course to use as a buffer to your schedule. I highly recommend Professor Goldfine.

I took this course online during the summer semester.  Professor Goldfine is great and you can tell that he's dedicated to living a healthy lifestyle & teaching this course.  It's not difficult but it's not easy - you will have to put forth some effort.  If you complete the modules & participate in the online discussions, you'll do well.

Coach Bernie is a terrific teacher.  Highly recommend.  He awards extra points if you do thorough work.  He grades strictly by the Rubric so use it and you will make an A.  Took online summer class that was 4 weeks long.  Have to fill out 6 different healthy reports, but as long as you are detailed and follow the rubric, it is easy.  No tests.

The assignments were really easy and geared towards showing your personal fitness levels. Instructions were often hard to come by, as he seems to struggle with technology a little and the course is confusingly laid out, but he is helpful and responds to emails quickly.

I took this class as an online four week summer course and it was the best decision ever! There is A LOT of work, but it is very easy to get it done if you're motivated. There are quizzes for every chapter covered, but if you read the book, you will make A's on them. Projects overwhelm you, but they are very easy to complete. TAKE!!!

Took the class thinking an easy A. Not so much. Had a midterm and final as only tests. And a few smaller weighted things. A lot of information. Lectures are long and all PP posted. Easy to get off topic. Tells stories about his kids a lot. Nice guy, pay attention and read the book.

Bernie is the man! He is super fun! I recommend taking this class as a Maymester. Nobody wants the nitty gritty of HPS to linger a whole semester! No problem getting an A in the class. Review notes & power points and know any formulas & you will get a 100. You have to get the book for the labs. Get the book & just copy the labs so you can sell back

Coach Bernie is probably the coolest and most fit 60 year old I've ever met. Provides Power Points and all you have to do is fill them in with what he says. Tests aren't bad. Need book to read and tear out labs. Gives extra credit. I HIGHLY recommend to take him for any HPS/HPE class especially the Maymester HPS 1000 class.

Took because I thought it would be an easy A, the class isn't hard but he grades kind of harshly on the notebook at the end. There's only a few grades. Seems easy and relaxed but make sure you keep up with everything throughout the semester. Class is just PP lectures and kind of boring.

Great professor! He is very enthusiastic and he is very willing to help you if you need to go over something again. His tests are fair, but only one person failed it. You do well if you study what he outlines during his study session.

One of the most enthusiastic professors I have ever had. He not only is passionate about the material, he is a great role model. I have been inspired to take a new approach in my life toward fitness and nutrition thanks to Dr. Goldfine

AWFUL. You don't have a choice, he's the only one that teaches the class. All he does is go over powerpoints. Don't buy the book... it's pointless. The golf tournament that you have to do at the end of the semester is a joke. So is the 30 page portfolio you have to do that he doesn't even read.. such a joke.

he means well, but likes things done his way. Tests are very hard but are straight forward if you study. Hid test #2 is easier most the class got b and As compared to F,D,Cs from the 1st one. His class is not the most interesting but you'll enjoy the drama.
Demanding, but fair. Makes the class interesting
An excellent and entertaining professor.  A hard but fair grader.  Nice legs!!!
